item.title: Tidy Iliad
item.description: Inspired by yet another @hrbrmstr project, I thought I’d have a go at replicating his approach for assessing the sentiment of a book, but using Homer’s Iliad. (I know, it’s not Christmas-y but hey ho ho ho). library(hrbrthemes) library(stringi) library(tidytext) library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ──────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 2.2.1 ✔ purrr 0.2.4 ## ✔ tibble 1.4.2 ✔ dplyr 0.7.4 ## ✔ tidyr 0.8.0 ✔ stringr 1.3.0 ## ✔ readr 1.
